Entities.Name: Medication
Entities.Definition: Pharmacological agents mentioned in the context of imaging or clinical findings.
Entities.SampleData: Non contrast routine CT imaging chest.

Entities.Name: Imaging
Entities.Definition: Imaging modality used or referenced in the radiology report.
Entities.SampleData: Non contrast medication routine CT chest.

Entities.Name: Anatomy
Entities.Definition: Specific anatomical regions mentioned in the radiology report.
Entities.SampleData: Unchanged right hemidiaphragm elevation and chronic basal right lower lobe.

Entities.Name: Side
Entities.Definition: Laterality of findings such as 'left', 'right', etc.
Entities.SampleData: Low suspicion 3 mm measurement right side upper lobe.

Entities.Name: Diagnosis (positive)
Entities.Definition: Confirmed or suspected clinical condition mentioned in the report.
Entities.SampleData: Linear atelectasis diagnosis(P) along the minor fissure.

Entities.Name: Diagnosis (negative)
Entities.Definition: Negative findings explicitly stated in the report.

Entities.Name: Measurement
Entities.Definition: Numeric size measurements mentioned in the report.
Entities.SampleData: Low suspicion 3 mm measurement right side upper lobe.

Dataset.Name: Figure 2 â€“ Annotated CT Radiology Snippet (SapienNER Evaluation)
Dataset.Description: Example annotated CT report showing outputs of SapienNER. Entities include diagnoses, anatomy, measurements, and modifiers.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Figure 2 demonstrates token-level annotations performed by SapienNER. Labels are assigned to clinical entities including medications, imaging types, and pulmonary findings. Colored highlights indicate different entity types.
